pullrequest.title: WIP: Eigenvalue solver; antidifferentiate methods; mid-domain BC

content.raw: Cool I think adding the state variables to the dict for analysis is a good idea.  In that case, they should be added to evaluator.vars after adding the RHS system handlers and tasks, so that linearity is still enforced on the ODE.
content.html: Cool I think adding the state variables to the dict for analysis is a good idea. In that case, they should be added to evaluator.vars after adding the RHS system handlers and tasks, so that linearity is still enforced on the ODE.
